P007959.project_name: Urban Sites and Services Development Project

keywords.cdata: accounting,Audits,basic services,cities,communities,community participation,districts,down payments,dwelling,dwelling units,economic development,employment,engineers,financial institutions,financial planning,Fiscal Year,foreign exchange,health services,homes,households,houses,Housing,housing construction,housing costs,income,institutional development,labor force,land tenure,Living conditions,makeshift dwellings,Migration,neighborhood,nutrition,occupations,private housing,private sector,productivity,public transportation,residential areas,roads,savings,self-help,settlement,settlements,settlers,sewage,sewerage services,slums,social development,social mobilization,Subsidiary,Technical Assistance,transport,urban areas,urban centers,urban concentration,Urban Development,urban economy,urban plans,urban poor,urban population,Urban Programs,Urban Projects,urban services,Urbanization,waste,water meters,water supply

project_abstract.cdata: The project would consist of: (i) water and sewerage for pueblos jovenes in Lima and Arequipa providing about 7,200 household connections; (ii) electrification of 16,300 households in pueblos jovenes in Lima and Arequipa; (iii) access roads of 86.1 km to connect pueblos jovenes to main roads and upgrade existing roads in these settlements; (iv) health and nutrition centers in pueblos jovenes in Lima; (v) industrial sites and services in Lima and Arequipa; (vi) housing and commercial sites and services in Lima; and (vii) supervised credit in Arequipa; and (viii) technical assistance.
